item.title: Philosophy of Science/Math Articles
item.description: I’ve read a lot of math and science articles over the past decade. Most were technical, some were pop-sci, and very few were philosphical. These are some of the math/science articles and forum posts that stick in my brain the most! I don’t agree with everything written but each gave me something to think about. Academia and Society What’s a Mathematician to do? by Bill Thurston On proof and progress in mathematics by Bill Thurston
